transcript: and I love this close you know the definition of courage what is it Courage isn't the absence of fear it's action despite having fear if you weren't I'd be worried about you because this is a serious commitment and so the fact that you're nervous or the fact that you're afraid makes you just like everyone else who succeeds so you associate this negative feeling with being the successful person they want to be who buys and they're like I just said the same thing that all these other successful people said right before they signed up I guess I should sign up
